courses.title: Introduction to Guitar
courses.description: Learn the basics of playing guitar, including chords, strumming patterns, and simple songs.

courses.title: Mastering Piano Techniques
courses.description: Advanced piano techniques for aspiring pianists, including finger exercises and complex compositions.

courses.title: Jazz Drumming Essentials
courses.description: Explore the fundamentals of jazz drumming, from basic rhythms to improvisation.

courses.title: Violin for Beginners
courses.description: Step-by-step guide to learning violin for beginners, covering posture, bowing, and simple tunes.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Learn to create electronic music using popular digital audio workstations and plugins.

courses.title: Classical Guitar Masterclass
courses.description: Advanced techniques and repertoire for classical guitarists looking to refine their skills.

courses.title: Singing for Beginners
courses.description: Introduction to singing, covering vocal techniques, breathing exercises, and simple songs.

courses.title: Advanced Music Theory
courses.description: In-depth exploration of music theory concepts, including harmony, counterpoint, and analysis.

courses.title: Songwriting Essentials
courses.description: Learn the art of songwriting, from crafting lyrics to composing melodies and chord progressions.

courses.title: Introduction to Music Production
courses.description: Get started with music production, learning about recording, mixing, and mastering techniques.
